projectItems.title: Short Story App
projectItems.description: After taking a break from projects to focus on finding and settling in at a new job, I wanted to do a fun project that satisifed an ongoing need of mine... more good reading! Please see XWiki link for more details.

projectItems.title: Arch Linux PC
projectItems.description: A small project that was a lot of fun and highly educational. I built a PC with my brother over Christmas and used that as an opportunity to set up an Arch install. Check out the docs for step-by-step instructions on how I did it. Couldn't be happier with the result!

projectItems.title: Portfolio Cloud Manager
projectItems.description: The most ambitious project (in terms of technical complexity) I've come up with for myself. The act of attempting it solo taught me a lot and I still plan to return to it. From it, I began work on my Kubernetes Developer certification and my ongoing Golang development journey.

projectItems.title: DriscollDocs
projectItems.description: My solution to communicating my projects, providing myself with documentation for my various projects and counteracting my terrible memory.

projectItems.title: Personal website
projectItems.description: If you're reading this from LinkedIn, it clearly did its job!
